<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Remote Trigger](/Feats.aspx?ID=6416) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=265)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6414)

</column>

---

You've learned how to trigger [snares](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) from afar, creating ranged hazards to assail your opponents and allowing you to disarm enemies' snares harmlessly. You can [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) a snare to trigger it prematurely. If you crafted the snare, you automatically hit. If someone else crafted it, attempt a ranged Strike against the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) DC, triggering the snare only if you hit.
name: Remote Trigger
